text: Sphingomonas oligophenolica is a Gram-negative, strictly aerobic and non- motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from paddy field soil in Japan.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen UniProt Sphingomonas oligophenolica has the ability to degrade phenolic acids. == Further reading == * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas oligophenolica at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase oligophenolica Category:Bacteria described in 2004
title: Sphingomonas oligophenolica
